data.message: I have a problem i have a second account on which i am confused the password i asked for a restore and i was sent a code ?? but where? Can you email me nothing over the week did not come even though I'm asking for a re-account I'm 9 years old nowhere does not work trusted contacts? Nor did any of them get anything at all and that the help page is canceled as well as the FB thank you for your willingness and especially for the help

replies.message: Hey Vanesa! You can learn more about what to do if you're not receiving the email to reset your password here: http://bit.ly/2tQaKpr. Thanks! -Caitlin

Thank you for your advice but it does not work either because it does not work or request for help friends or email no administrator email address nowhere can not see the news from Facebook by sending a new code to reset the password, the site with the help of friends where to copy the address on which they get coded and then I do not know how to do it, it does not work here, here in Czech Republic there is no request for help with Facebook, nothing works, even sending to mob phone sending code to friends nothing, password recovery probably ends up just do not understand why facebook is for us when he The nose does not show interest with help ?? I'm disappointed help is probably not the shame of the miserable 9 years of pity ...

Facebook  my friend's account is blocked by facebook and she can not do anything about it, confirmation sms would not come and changing the phone number wouldnt help. She is desperate since 8 years of her conversations with a friends, photographs and memories are gone. Link to her profile is https://www.facebook.com/elena.trishankova
